content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I failed in the final exam.
That is a terrible disappointment to hear. I' m sorry to hear that, had you failed the exam?
I tried hard to cram but it doesn't work.
I can imagine how stressful it would be for you. You' re a very dedicated student and I am happy to listen to you. Do you have any family around that you can talk to if it works out for you?
